io.nem.symbol.core.crypto

Class Hashes

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nem.symbol.core.crypto.Hashes

  • public class Hashes
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class that exposes hash functions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] hash160(byte[]... inputs)

      • sha3_256

        public static byte[] sha3_256(byte[]... inputs)
        Performs a SHA_3_256 hash of the concatenated inputs.
        Parameters:
        inputs - The byte arrays to concatenate and hash.
        Returns:
        The hash of the concatenated inputs.
        Throws:
        CryptoException - if the hash operation failed.
